name: cpp-skeleton
description: Automated cpp skeleton from matching .hpp file

cpp-skeleton.headerCommandId.title: Header command ID
cpp-skeleton.headerCommandId.description: The id of the command to execute at the creation of the skeleton (example: 42header.insertHeader). CAREFUL: this will actually EXECUTE the command and unknown commands will result in no skeleton creations! Leave it to blank for no command to execute

cpp-skeleton.generateSettersAndGetters.title: Setters and getters Generation
cpp-skeleton.generateSettersAndGetters.description: The skeleton implements the setters and getters when a method start with set, or get

cpp-skeleton.matchingHppPath.title: relative path of the matching hpp file
cpp-skeleton.matchingHppPath.description: The relative path of the matching hpp file : ex "." or "../includes"
